thread.title: Kevin McCarthy drops out of speaker race
thread.title_full: Kevin McCarthy drops out of speaker race

title: Kevin McCarthy drops out of speaker race
text:
Kevin McCarthy Drops Out Of House Speaker Race Elizabeth Hagedorn 
Photo Credit: Getty Images / T.J. Kirkpatrick 
Kevin McCarthy is dropping out of the race for Speaker of House. 
As House Majority Leader, he was the favorite to replace Speaker John Boehner, who will be resigning at the end of the month. (Video via House Republicans ) 
Other Republicans in the running include Utah Rep. Jason Chaffetz — chair of the powerful House Oversight Committee — as well as Florida Rep. Daniel Webster. 
This video includes images from Getty Images.
